products.title: Scandi Bloom Saffron Yellow Roman Blind
products.description: Inspired by traditional scandinavian folk art, scandi bloom is a lush pattern, consisting of bold, clean lines and coordinating colours. A fabulous pairing of two trend shades, this saffron yellow roman blind, blending grey and yellow together with a contemporary twist, will look at home in your window. Accessorise with natural materials for the ultimate scandi-look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roman blind comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.
